body.p: Here with is the application of Mr Samel Williams now of Fleming county. for a remittance of a fine imposed in Bourbon co it explains itself
Mr Williams is a good and true man and I surely hope you may find it proper to remit the fine if so send it to him directed to Tilton, Fleming Co Ky.

Bourbon Cir Ct
vs
Sam Williams
$40.
8th Nov/64
